meanings.meaning: 1. word; remark; statement
言 【こと】
1. language; dialect See also 言語「言葉の一面は、伝達しようとする意志である」と彼は言う。"One aspect of language is an intent to communicate," he says.
2. word; phrase; expression; term 言葉が出てこなかった。Words failed me.
3. speech; (manner of) speaking; (use of) language 乱暴な言葉を使ってはいけない。Don't be rough in speech.
4. words; remark; statement; comment
5. learning to speak; language acquisition

言語 【ごんご】、言語 【げんきょ】
げんきょ: Out-dated or obsolete kana usage.
1. to say; to utter; to declare 「みんなひと休みしようぜ」とジョンは言った。John said, "Hey guys, let's take a break."
2. to name; to call この動物は日本語で何と言いますか。What do you call this animal in Japanese?
3. to go (e.g. "the alarm went ping"); to make a noise Only applies to 言う
言う 【ゆう】、云う 【いう】、云う 【ゆう】、謂う 【いう】、謂う 【ゆう】
1. to say; to utter; to declare 「みんなひと休みしようぜ」とジョンは言った。John said, "Hey guys, let's take a break."
2. to name; to call この動物は日本語で何と言いますか。What do you call this animal in Japanese?
3. to go (e.g. "the alarm went ping"); to make a noise Only applies to 言う
言う 【ゆう】、云う 【いう】、云う 【ゆう】、謂う 【いう】、謂う 【ゆう】

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to begin to say; to start talking; to broach (a matter); to bring up; to come out with 我々が静かに夕食をとっていると、突然、母がもう一度学校に行くつもりだと言い出した。We were having a quiet supper when out of the blue my mother announced she was going back to school.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to be the first to say; to suggest (doing); to propose マネージャーは、私が彼と一緒に空港に行ってはどうかと言い出した。The manager suggested that I go with him to the airport.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb

The manager suggested that I go with him to the airport.

meanings.type: Noun, Suru verb, Transitive verb, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. excuse 他人の悪事を引き合いに出して自分の悪事の言い訳をすることはできない。Two wrongs don't make a right.

meanings.type: Noun, Suru verb, Transitive verb, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. explanation ジェーンは自分の言い訳が正しいと主張した。Jane insisted that she was right.

meanings.meaning: 1. (one's) speech; expression of views; discussion
1. (one's) speech; expression of views; discussion
1. to tell (to do); to order; to charge; to direct 彼はちゃんと私が言いつけておいたとおりにやった。He did exactly as I had told him.
2. to tell on (someone); to tattle; to report あなたが彼に言いつけたって私はちっともかまわない。You can tell him for all I care.
3. to often say
